title: FiveG
author: FiveG
content: In life if purpose of thing is not known abuse is inevitable, I have come realizes that many people do not have purpose of purchasing bitcoin only buy because they've money and when anything went wrong they will be to lament or query people. Sometimes is good you ask yourself certain questions why am I doing this? What is my aimed for it? What is my vision or dream towards this investment. Planning helps one achieved greater goals, imagine you bought bitcoin Worth $4 thousand and you're busy withdrawing on every moves weather favourable or against you, nothing will really make sense with that because you can no longer control your finance and at the end the money will never remain the same but think about this purposeful questions like:1. Acquired more knowledge of bitcoin?2. How much will involved?3. How long do I want this?4. What is my target in the next five years?5. Is it futuristic or gambling or daily income? 6. Can i be an hero that can make others to be an hero's?When you begins to question most of this purposeful questions you will enjoy more benefits of becoming great with bitcoin.

comments.author: ilovealtcoins
comments.body: The purpose for which we all buy bitcoin is for money, for profit, nothing more and nothing less. What you mention are everyone's plans and goals, and no two will be the same. I don't think someone invests in bitcoin without a purpose. But investing in bitcoin is not for everyone, if you have a specific strategy and plan, you will succeed. But if you invest without a plan and invest blindly because you think it's easy, you will lose.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Me: buying bitcoin because I prefer having self-custody over my money and I think that the price will go up some time in the future. It's really that simple lmao.

comments.author: Patrol69
comments.body: Determining symptoms is very important in our life. Because if there is no goal in life then our life will be stuck somewhere. People who set a goal in life try to do something to fulfill that goal in life but those who have no goal in life do not even try to fulfill their goal. Suppose a person earns $5 a day and has no set goal in life. He earns $5 a day and spends $5 and lives like that. But another person earns $5 a day but has a goal in life. Earning five dollars a day, he invests in a place without spending five dollars to fulfill his goal. That is, even if the second person suffers for a short period of time, he is more likely to succeed later.Â  So each of us should have a specific goal in life.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: OP, I can mention up to five different guys that I knew that really really understand what's Bitcoin is all about but they're not ready to invest money in Bitcoin at all.They understand what blockchain is and they understand why Bitcoin was created but they're still not ready to invest anything in Bitcoin, the reason why they choose to do so is unknown to me till today, all I have left is to keep guessing why.Maybe they are scared of losing their money or maybe they don't want to see Bitcoin succeed or they're scared that one day Bitcoin can turn into a scam.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: I don't believe there is anyone who buys BTC without a purpose, whatever reason that prompted someone to purchase BTC is their purpose. Though there are some purposes that may be wrong in my own opinion, like buying BTC to get rich so fast, but the good thing is BTC is permissionless, so nobody call tell others what purpose is good or bad, you can buy it and use it how you like without my permission or that of anybody.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: It's a very good idea to always define your purpose before doing anything in life, if you heard about bitcoin then the next thing is to research about it, learn and under it before deciding on having interest mind for investing on it, ones you've decided for yourself, ensure you have the adequate knowledge about bitcoin before you invested, dont leverage on others or depends on anyone to engage your investment or control them for you, it's all you can do by yourself as long as you're having the right information on how to go about it.

comments.author: CryptocurencyKing
comments.body: At the moment, I think one of the most reasons investors purchase Bitcoin is the fact that, we see it for an investment that can earn us dividends in the near future and at this time, its still early. This makes it auch better time to buy and hold, given the much it has appreciated in its short time.So, its not strange to find users using various strategies to purchase the coin. It is a preparation for an unknown but speculated future. It would be hard yo accept that, you had the opportunity at this time, had the resources to get in and still, refused to make preparations.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: worle1bm on June 05, 2023, 05:56:15 AMQuote from: ilovealtcoins on June 05, 2023, 05:25:47 AMThe purpose for which we all buy bitcoin is for money, for profit, nothing more and nothing less. But if you invest without a plan and invest blindly because you think it's easy, you will lose.This is not correct because you are seeing it as investment purpose or considering it as an asset only but the main aim behind bitcoin creation was to provide an alternative way for payment others then fiat with decentralised nature.You see merchants and companies accepting it now so it is being used to make payments as well so your explanation doesn't sound right to me.People see profits in it so they holf it but this doesn't make it only for that purpose.It can go both ways.You can see Bitcoin as an currency, and at the same time, you can see it as an asset as well. It all depends on the motives of a particular person. There are some who sees Bitcoin as an investment alone, and there are some who sees it as an asset. At the end of the day, what's important is you achieved your goal. If you see Bitcoin as an asset where you can get profit from investing into it then there's no problem there. Now if you sees Bitcoin as a currency that can be used as an alternative mode of payment then there's nothing wrong there. Bitcoin was created as a currency at first, but over the years, people are seeing it as either an asset or both a currency, and an asset. As for me, I only have 2 reasons on why I'm purchasing Bitcoin. One is I want to have access to my own money, and the other one is that I want profit.

Then, determine the amount of money and how much you can afford to invest. And finally, be patient and wait until the Bitcoin price reaches your desired target.
